words.definition: The process of introducing air into the soil.
sentences: Tilling the soil improves its aeration.
Good aeration is important for root growth.
Compacted soil needs aeration.

words.definition: The process by which soil particles are pressed together, reducing pore space and increasing density.
sentences: Heavy machinery can cause soil compaction.
Soil compaction makes it hard for roots to grow.
Reducing compaction improves soil health.

words.definition: Water that flows over the surface of the ground rather than soaking into the soil.
sentences: Heavy rain caused agricultural runoff.
Runoff can carry pesticides into rivers.
Controlling runoff helps prevent pollution.

words.definition: Methods used to prevent or reduce the wearing away of soil by wind or water.
sentences: Planting cover crops is a form of erosion control.
Terracing is an effective erosion control method.
Erosion control protects valuable topsoil.

words.definition: A line of trees or shrubs planted to protect an area from the wind.
sentences: The windbreak protected the crops from strong winds.
Windbreaks help prevent soil erosion.
He planted a new windbreak around his field.

words.definition: A line of trees or shrubs planted to protect an area, especially a farm field, from the wind and erosion.
sentences: The shelterbelt reduced wind damage to the crops.
Shelterbelts provide habitat for wildlife.
Planting shelterbelts is a good farming practice.

words.definition: Plowing along the contours of the land rather than up and down a slope, to prevent soil erosion.
sentences: Contour plowing helps save soil on hillsides.
The farmer practiced contour plowing.
Contour plowing reduces water runoff.

words.definition: The practice of growing different crops in alternate strips along contours to reduce erosion.
sentences: Strip cropping combines different crops in one field.
Strip cropping is effective for erosion control.
The field looked colorful with strip cropping.

words.definition: The practice of making flat areas on a hillside for farming.
sentences: Terracing is common in mountainous farming regions.
Terracing helps grow crops on steep slopes.
The ancient Incas used extensive terracing.
